roleset.name: taking a vacation, break (from something)

roles.note: Watch out for calendar dates. Try to only select instances that indicate the act of taking a vacation. It can be blurry, so do your best. If it's too blurry to tell, go ahead and tag.

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE. .YY
example.text: The population increases in the season when tourists come from all across the globe to spend their holiday in Turkey.
example.note: Here, 'spend' is a clue that they're talking about a chunk of time, rather than an act of vacationing.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: The two then embark on their holiday in Fiji.
example.note: Here, 'embark' is a clue that it is an event.

example.name: Light verb
example.text: I may take a holiday in Spain / Leave my wings behind me / Drink my worries down the drain / And fly away to somewhere new /

example.text: When asked why no economists support her tax holiday plan , she said they were elitists who do n't understand the pain the common man is in .
